title: The organization of the future
abstract: Introduction: Toward the New Organization (P. Drucker). SHAPING TOMORROWS'S ORGANIZATIONS. Preparing for Organizational Change (J. Champy). How Generational Shifts Will Transform Organizational Life (J. Conger). The Soul of the New Organization (M. Hammer). The Big Organization of the Future (R. Ducques & P. Gaske). Will the Organization of the Future Make the Mistakes of the Past? (J. Pfeffer). Designing for Implementability (O. Gadiesh & S. Olivet). New Competencies for a New World (I. Somerville & J. Mroz). NEW MODELS FOR WORKING AND ORGANIZING. The Circular Organization (F. Hesselbein). The Reconfigurable Organization (J. Galbraith). The Organization's New Clothes (R. Ashkenas). The Mondragon Model: A New Pathway for the Twenty--First Century (J. Barker). The Future Organization: A Chameleon in All Its Glory (D. Miller). Creating a Leadership Organization with a Learning Mission (G. Jones). ORGANIZING FOR STRATEGIC ADVANTAGE. Restoring People to the Heart of the Organization of the Future (R. Kanter). Competitiveness and Civic Character (P. Kotler). The Work of New Age Manners in the Emerging Competitive Landscape (C. Prahalad). Organizing for Endless Winning (M. Hanaka & B. Hawkins). Creating Sustainable Learning Communities for the Twenty--First Century (S. Marshall). Organizing Around Capabilities (D. Ulrich). WORKING AND ORGANIZING IN A WIRED WORLD. Human Capital in the Digital Economy (A. Smith & T. Kelly). Shock Waves from the Communications Revolution (E. Miller). Self--Esteem in the Information Age (N. Branden). The Seven R's of Self--Esteem (D. Sethi). Future Present (F. Harmon). LEADING PEOPLE IN THE ORGANIZATION OF THE FUTURE. Passing the Baton: Preparing Tomorrow's Leaders (J. Rocksmith). Retaining Your Top Performers (M. Goldsmith). Situational Leadership in the Multicultural Organization (P. Hersey & D. Johnson. Emotions, Tempo, and Timing in Managing People (P. Everaert). Leading Across Cultures: Five Vital Capabilities (J. Alexander & M. Wilson). Cultivating Inner Resources for Leadership (D. Walsh). Learning to Lead (R. Rosen). NEW DEFINITIONS OF ORGANIZATIONAL HEALTH. Employee Work--Life Balance: The Competitive Advantage (L. Platt). The Healthy Organization: A Profile (R. Beckhard). Diversity and Organizations of the Future (R. Thomas). Producing Social Results (G. Parston). The Voluntary Health Organization of the Future (J. Seffrin). Building a Healthy Company--For the Long Term (A. Dahlberg, et al.). The Next Challenge (C. Argyris). The Last Word. Unimagined Futures. Charles Handy.
